column5: Good Day Everyone. Based on the very positive feedback from the poll I posted, I would like to announce a Niagara area Swill. Wednesday, May 2 starting at 7:00 pm The Judge & Jester (formerly Winchester Arms) in downtown Grimsby.  The restaurant has recently been taken over and totally renovated and is awesome.  We held our Toonie Tournament Banquet in the back room a few weeks ago just after they opened and the room, service and food was excellent.  Wednesday night is their 49 cent wing night and I have the rear room booked. Hope to see many of the regulars and some new faces as well as many who attend the Oakville Swills.  If I can make it to Oakville, hopefully, some of you will head out to the Golden Horseshoe to lend your support.  I also thought that this might provide another opportunity for our OFC Community to come together to show its support for young Chris or perhaps Pete's family from Pete's tackle.  Looking for support and ideas.  Please indicate if you plan to attend.  Hope to see you there.  Perhaps one of the mods would pin this thread.  Map to Judge & Jester
I am in Roger. Anyone need a ride from Burlington??
Oohhh tempting, I'll check with the mrs!  Tony

I should be able to make it! Coming from St Catharines if anyone what to car-pool...I don't know what we can do for Peter Lee's family, but maybe everyone could bring something to make a care-package for Chris? Tackle maybe, though he may well have more tackle than he needs by now.

Oh Roger - You KNOW i'll be there - start cookin' those wings - Gonna get me a wack-o-wings  LOL  Really looking forward to it and that is a good point Roger - alot of us Niagara OFC'ers make it all the way to the Oakville Swills - hope to see some TO people.   Don

Roger, I may be able to make it, cant give a definite answer because I dont know how I will feel then but I will let you know. I also agree there is more that can be done for Chris and Rob.. Lets pony up some cash, perhaps Rob could use a few things also ?? Great idea! something along the lines of I will pay 1.00 for every wing I order (Uhmmmm perhaps I will order 50 of em? I didnt get fat by not eating LOL) ... .49 to the restaurant the rest to Chris & Rob? or something along those lines??   Gerritt
I'll be there, but 49 cents a wing? They better be good and big dang wings.  cd.
Count me and Alex in Roger!
A great lineup already! It will be good to see you again Joe.  By the way I've got another boat for sale

Very good possibility I'll be there.  I'll mention it to the wife, she shouldn't have a problem.  She may have an issue picking me up though, since I'll likely drink a few.  But I don't live far from there anyways. Its too bad that the pier in Grimsby is so small, or else it woulda been nice to take some casts before the swill.

dang  Wed night is no good for me,  hope there is a good turnout  FYI nice thought & gesture there Roger.... a local group of anglers & the City of St.Cath are currently working on something to honour Peter down here at a local fishing hole...
Geez, sorry we're going to miss you Dawg.  Was looking forward to having a good chinwag with you. I saw the posts on the other board about Pete.  Very cool initiative.
Hey Roger - how about directions or an address for the out of towners?  Don
Unfortunately, won't be able to make it.  Had some side jobs to do, as well as getting packed for Quinte the next day.  Have fun boys.
I'm in Roger...maybe with my dear wife, maybe by myself...  Pete, If you need a ride no prob, Barbara doesn't drink...  John...
